MajorClaims.Text: problems posed by machines should draws more attentions as well
we cannot ignore its negative effects

Claims.Text: we cannot deny machines are play a vital role in people living and working
although using machines have many benefits
the disadvantages of machines that bring to us should not be neglected by people

Premises.Text: Not like human, machines do not need rest, which means they can work as long as employers want and consistently produce high quality products without any mistakes
using machines can save company's money
machines never ask for salary, over-time pay or pension
employers do not need to spend money on employee's welfare
The company only needs some technicians to make sure machines are working on the right track or replace some part when machines are not working
machines are more effective than human
because of extensive of using machines, many people loss their job
Especially in large population countries, high unemployment rate may cause crime and social instability
using of machines are also pose serious pollution and energy dissipation
nowadays people prefer to use dish-washing machine to wash dishes and plates rather than hand washing
they did not know that compared with hand washing dish-washing machine consume at least 2 times water and electricity to wash these tableware
if thousands of families use dish-washing machines, how many water and how much electricity will be wasted
